summary: The diff fully implements both requirements. REQ-1 updates the color palette in frontend/index.css with warm orange primary (oklch(0.75 0.15 55)) and deep navy blue secondary (oklch(0.30 0.08 240)) colors matching the logo tonality, including dark mode variants. REQ-2 updates theme colors in frontend/index.html (#E89A3C) and frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest to match the new primary color. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
